columns.Entrepreneur_ID: The unique identifier for each entrepreneur.
columns.People_ID: The identifier linking to the associated person.
columns.Company: The name of the company founded by the entrepreneur.
columns.Money_Requested: The amount of funding requested from investors.
columns.Investor: The name of the investor considering the funding.

entrepreneur.table_description: The table tracks entrepreneurs, their companies, funding requests, and investors.

columns.People_ID: The unique identifier for each person.
columns.Name: The full name of the person.
columns.Height: The height of the person in meters.
columns.Weight: The weight of the person in kilograms.
columns.Date_of_Birth: The birthdate of the person in YYYY-MM-DD format.

people.table_description: The table records personal details of individuals.
